mapper.select: select planID from `plan` order by planID desc limit 1

select * from `plan` where planID = (select planID from `userplan` where userID = #{userID} ) or planID=(select planID from `groupplan` where groupID=(select groupID from `userrole` where userID=#{userID})) order by planDeadline asc
select count(*) from `userplan` where planID = #{planID} and userID = #{userID}
select role from `userrole` where userID = #{userID} and groupID = #{groupID}
